  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085966</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Grouping skills for mastery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gruppierung der Fähigkeiten für Beherrschung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grouper des qualifications pour la maîtrise</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Agrupando habilidades para o mastery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Raggruppamento delle abilità per padronanza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεξιότητες ομαδοποίησης για την κυριότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agrupar las habilidades para la maestría</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Thematic planning helps relate mathematics to students' lives.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thematische Planung Hilfen stehen Mathematik auf 
den Leben der Kursteilnehmer in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les aides thématiques de planification associent 
des mathématiques aux vies des étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As ajudas thematic do planeamento relacionam a 
matemática às vidas dos estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli aiuti tematici di progettazione collegano la 
matematica alle vite degli allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι θεματικές οδηγίες προγραμματισμού αφορούν τα 
μαθηματικά τις ζωές των σπουδαστών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las ayudas temáticas de las hojas de operación 
(planning) relacionan matemáticas con las vidas de los estudiantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
